title: We were unable to connect to the support site. Wait a minute or so before trying again.
body: We were unable to connect to the support site. Wait a minute or so before trying again. MAN RIOT 1WEEK STILL CANT WTF U ARE DOING

replies.body: I wasn't able to find any issues logging into the support site.  Try clearing your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) or another browser to see if that works.  Otherwise, you can also reach out to us directly by sending an email to support@riotgames.com.  I hope that helps!
